metadata.title: CVE-2024-4773 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: When a network error occurred during page load, the prior content couldhave remained in view with a blank URL bar. This could have been used toobfuscate a spoofed web site. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 126.

criterions.comment: thunderbird package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs78 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs91 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs102 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
